description: The Trekker Lite III GTX is robust and light with a medium stiff midsole ideal for everyday excursions. The EVA midsole keeps the weight to a minimum allowing you to go further with less fatigue. The perfect blend for everyday trail use with the ruggedness to venture off trail over technical terrain when needed. Hand crafted in Europe by AKU with premium materials from Gore-Tex and Vibram the Trekker Lite will keep you moving in comfort.
name: Aku Trekker Lite III GTX - Mens
